heroSectionBio: Hey, I'm Mobin — a curious full-stack developer from Gorgan 🇮🇷 who started this coding journey in the world of Android apps with Java. These days, I craft modern web apps using React, Node.js, and Express, and I’m totally hooked on clean architecture. Also, yes... I run Arch Linux (btw 😎). Let’s build something cool!
experience1Text: As a Senior Software Engineer at Google, I played a pivotal role in developing innovative solutions for Google's core search algorithms. Collaborating with a dynamic team of engineers, I contributed to the enhancement of search accuracy and efficiency, optimizing user experiences for millions of users worldwide.
experience2Text: During my tenure at Apple, I held the role of Software Architect, where I played a key role in shaping the architecture of mission-critical software projects. Responsible for designing scalable and efficient systems, I provided technical leadership to a cross-functional team
experience3Text: At Meta, I worked on large-scale social networking infrastructure, improving backend performance and scalability for billions of users. My role involved optimizing APIs, database queries, and integrating new features while maintaining system stability.
footerText: Full-stack wizard 🧙‍♂️ with 5+ years of coding magic ✨ — started casting spells in Java ☕ for Android, now conjuring sleek web apps with React ⚛️, Node.js 🌐, and Express 🚀. Arch Linux fanboy 🐧 by day, clean code ninja 🥷 by night. Ready to build cool stuff? Let’s chat! 💬
